channel.title: } Help A Noob This Christmas {
channel.description:
Right i need to know what to do to make the ip ban work in project czar.
Before you make the assumption that i am a master coder in disguise, i need to tell you that i am certainly not :| .
Im learning java and im only up to learning functions. So yes im a total java noob, but i really need an ip ban that works in the server because im getting terrorised.
When i add ips to the Data > Banned ip it doesnt work. Do i need a ban handler ? or a code to close the "banned ip's" ports? (just something i heard of whilst snooping around the forums).
I would apreciate it if you could help me. Even if you just tell me what i need to do .. and il try and conjur up some code from somewhere.
Thanks for reading.

item.title: } Help A Noob This Christmas {
item.dc:creator: @bonghead bonghead
item.description:
@bonghead wrote:

bonghead:

When i add ips to the Data > Banned ip it doesnt work.

All they do is mass the log-in button and there back in :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2007, 07:59:29 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Runer King, post:2, topic:169265”]If you want the command, you’re a lazy noob.[/quote]

How can you call being sat at your computer and not moving the mouse or lifting your fingers, lazy?

You should go get a job then come back with your insane comments.

Read full topic

item.title: } Help A Noob This Christmas {
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

Go to the players file, copy their connected from, and paste in the ipban.Java

If you want the command, you’re a lazy noob.

Read full topic
